name: Flippers of Steel
description:
This game was made with love for the Kindred Games' Kindred Community Jam #5 in seven days! The theme choices for this jam were Penguin Party or The Fire Mustn't Go Out. We chose to mix the two together for this fun blacksmith to fire up his forge and get weapons out to the adventuring penguins in their party.

The team:

 Louis Van Dyke: Programming

 David Rosler: Programming

 Janna Kocha: Art

 Limesy: Art

 Hamish Smithers: Music

 Ben Bingham: Sounds
